text: Cranbrook is a Canadian city in British Columbia, Canada. Cranbrook is in the southeastern and the East Kootenay region of British Columbia. At the 2021 census, 20,499 people lived in Cranbrook. It was named a city in 1905. Cranbrook was home to an WHL team called the Kootenay Ice until they moved to Winnipeg in 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Cranbrook's Official website Category:Cities in British Columbia Category:1898 establishments in Canada
title: Cranbrook, British Columbia
